name: Weyland! always advance

name: Parasite running
description: Getting the most out of parasite to kill ICE. Deck has 12 recursion options.

name: De-resolve v1.2
description:
Another update!

The deck proved quite solid, and Underworld Contact proved to be an invaluable help to the economy. False Echo is more of a nuisance than a real danger, but might still remove ICE when the Corp is low on money, and then it really shines. Corp will have to install again, losing time and potentially money (since they might need to spend all their clicks for credits, but if there is no ICE left on a remote...).

- The Helpful AI wasn't actually helpful at all, removed.
- Self-modifying Code up to 3 copies.
- Added a single copy of Crypsis to have a jack-of-all-trades with non-fixed STR.
- The Maker's Eye switched with R&D Interface, as per suggestion.

name: HB: Braintrust
description:
Idea is to use Biotic to FA the Mandatory Upgrades and let it just spiral out of control (in a good way). Could switch some the Sentinels for Gila to have the potential for more Agendas scored out of hand.

I play this deck with the additional tactic of trying to "surprise" the runner with nasty ice when they don't expect it hit them for brain damage and threaten additional net damage once the Sentinels start to get scored.
